00024 #include "easylink.h" 
00025 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 // Mathematical errors management
00027 
00028 extern int_T _matherr(struct _exception *e)
00029 {
00030   const char *txt;
00031 
00032   switch (e->type)
00033   {
00034   case DOMAIN:
00035     txt = "Argument was not in domain of function, such as log(-1),";
00036     break;
00037 
00038   case SING:
00039     txt = "Argument would result in a singularity, such as pow(0, -2),";
00040     break;
00041 
00042   case OVERFLOW:
00043     txt = "Argument would produce a function result greater than DBL_MAX (or LDBL_MAX), such as exp(1000),";
00044     break;
00045 
00046   case UNDERFLOW:
00047     txt = "Argument would produce a function result less than DBL_MIN (or LDBL_MIN), such as exp(-1000),";
00048     break;
00049 
00050   case TLOSS:
00051     txt = "Argument would produce function result with total loss of significant digits, such as sin(10e70),";
00052     break;
00053     
00054   default: txt = "Unknown math error";
00055   }
00056   printf("EasyLink warning: (_matherr %i) %s in %s function.\n",e->type,txt,e->name);
00057   return 1; 
00058 }
00059 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
